Head of Software Engineering|Bristol|Full Time |Â£80-100K + Benefits

DNA Living is an ambitious startup that is being built by existing entrepreneurs in the DNA space that encompasses data science, web platforms, research and consumer facing technology.

We are looking for a smart, driven Head of Software Engineering who can build and lead a team of around 20 as we scale the company and product sets.

Launched just over a year ago, we have great growth and traction and now building our leadership team.

Find out more at LivingDNA.com

Contact peterc@dna-worldwide.com for more details

Ideally looking for UK based hires at present.
